items.title: InVideo | Comprehensive Course on How to Use The InVideo App

visible_instructors.title: Karen Prince
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Writing Software Teacher and Book Cover Designer.
visible_instructors.name: Karen

items.headline: Learn to Create Your Own Professional Quality Videos Using InVideo, Even if You Have Never Created a Video Before
objectives_summary: Step-by-step instructions for using all the features of InVideo video creation software.

Choose from hundreds of beautifully designed templates, already preconfigured to the correct aspect ratio for YouTube, Facebook, Instagram and more, and edit them to create your own marketing or social media videos in minutes.
Or design and create your own videos from scratch using InVideo’s extensive video, image and music libraries and all of its added features like text animations, special effects and enhancers.
